name: MorningMantra
0:
”Alexa, open morning mantra”
”Alexa, ask morning mantra for my fortune”
”Alexa, start morning mantra”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: morning mantra
des:
Ask Alexa for your morning mantra any time, and she'll read a randomly-selected response. 
You can ask anytime and as often as you want. 
Thanks for activating Morning Mantra Skill!

*This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests on this skill are not shared with the creator of the skill.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
